questions.question: What is the primary purpose of deploying the Core Network before starting the Connection Management experiment?

answers.b: To ensure all Network Functions are instantiated and interconnected
answers.c: To activate user plane traffic immediately

explanations.a: Incorrect. Authentication is only one part of core network functionality.
explanations.b: Correct. All NFs must be deployed and connected for signaling to occur.
explanations.c: Incorrect. User plane traffic requires session establishment.
explanations.d: Incorrect. NAS signaling is essential to the experiment.

questions.question: Which button switches the interface into Connection Management experiment mode?

explanations.a: Incorrect. Deploy Core only instantiates the network.
explanations.b: Incorrect. Add NF is for manual deployment.
explanations.c: Correct. This enables the Connection Management experiment view.

questions.question: Which message initiates the radio connection establishment between UE and gNB?

explanations.a: Incorrect. This is sent by the gNB.
explanations.b: Correct. UE sends RRC Connection Request to initiate radio access.
explanations.c: Incorrect. NAS Service Request is sent after RRC setup.
explanations.d: Incorrect. This occurs later via AMF.

questions.question: What information is included in the RRC Connection Request message?

explanations.a: Incorrect. QFI is used during PDU session setup.
explanations.b: Correct. UE identity and cause are part of the RRC request.
explanations.d: Incorrect. PDU Session ID is not part of RRC request.

questions.question: Which entity allocates radio resources during RRC Connection Setup?

explanations.a: Incorrect. UE requests but does not allocate resources.

questions.question: Which message carries the NAS Service Request from UE toward the core network?

explanations.a: Incorrect. This is sent by gNB.
explanations.b: Correct. NAS Service Request is embedded in this message.
explanations.c: Incorrect. PFCP is between SMF and UPF.
explanations.d: Incorrect. This is sent by AMF.

questions.question: Which interface is used by the UE to send NAS messages to the AMF?

explanations.a: Incorrect. N2 is between gNB and AMF.
explanations.b: Incorrect. N3 carries user plane data.
explanations.c: Correct. N1 is the NAS signaling interface.
explanations.d: Incorrect. N4 is used for PFCP.

questions.question: What is the role of the AMF after receiving the NAS Service Request?

explanations.a: Incorrect. User plane is handled by UPF.
explanations.b: Correct. AMF validates UE context and authorization.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Radio resources are managed by gNB.
explanations.d: Incorrect. PFCP rules are managed by SMF.

questions.question: Which message does the AMF send to the SMF to request session-related processing?

explanations.a: Incorrect. PFCP is used by SMF toward UPF.
explanations.b: Correct. AMF uses this message toward SMF.
explanations.c: Incorrect. This message is sent to gNB.
explanations.d: Incorrect. This is sent to UE.

questions.question: Which network function selects the UPF and allocates TEIDs?

explanations.a: Incorrect. AMF does not manage user plane tunnels.
explanations.b: Incorrect. gNB terminates but does not select UPF.
explanations.c: Correct. SMF performs UPF selection and TEID allocation.

questions.question: Which protocol is used between SMF and UPF to establish user plane sessions?

explanations.a: Incorrect. NGAP is between gNB and AMF.
explanations.c: Correct. PFCP is used on the N4 interface.
explanations.d: Incorrect. RRC is radio layer signaling.

questions.question: What does the PFCP Session Establishment Response confirm?

answers.c: Successful creation of user plane session

explanations.b: Incorrect. Radio bearers are handled by gNB.
explanations.c: Correct. UPF confirms PFCP session establishment.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Registration is a different procedure.

questions.question: Which message carries the tunnel information back from SMF to AMF?

explanations.a: Incorrect. This is sent to UE.
explanations.b: Correct. SMF sends tunnel details in this response.
explanations.c: Incorrect. This is sent by gNB.
explanations.d: Incorrect. This is part of RRC.

questions.question: Which interface is used by the AMF to instruct the gNB to set up PDU session resources?

explanations.a: Incorrect. N1 is UE-AMF NAS signaling.
explanations.b: Correct. N2 connects AMF and gNB.

questions.question: Which final message confirms to the UE that the PDU session is established?

explanations.a: Incorrect. This is sent to AMF.
explanations.c: Correct. NAS Service Accept confirms session establishment.
explanations.d: Incorrect. This is internal to core network.
